data.title: Tom Gores
data.meta_description: #270 Tom Gores on the 2024 Billionaires - Tom Gores oversees more than 40 companies with some $47 billion in assets through his Los Angeles-based private
data.text:
Mpox Vaccine Maker’s Shares Continue Rising As Concern Over Virus Outbreak Grows

There are several vaccines approved to use against mpox and stock for the favored shot have risen more than 40% this week.

Campaign Launched To Save World’s First Pop-Up Mall From Closure

Pioneering pop-up mall Boxpark, built from sea containers, is facing premature closure according to its founder, who blames planning red tape and is bidding to save it.

Is Free Speech Still Free? E.U. Threat Against Elon Musk Is A Terrifying Sign Of Things To Come

Here’s one aspect of inflation that doesn’t get enough attention: the rising price of free speech.

United Airlines Greenwashing Case Dismissed By Deregulation Act

This sets a precedent which could make U.S. carriers immune from the same claims filed against their global competitors.

2024 U.S. Oil Imports From Middle East Hit New Record Low

The percentage of U.S. oil imports from the Middle East is teetering with falling below double digits for the first time in more than three decades.

British Diving Icon Retires: Reflecting On The Legacy Of Tom Daley

Five-time Olympic medalist Tom Daley has announced his retirement from diving. Explore his career highlights, advocacy for LGBTQ+ rights, and impact beyond the sport.

Tom Petty’s 1965 Ford Mustang Is Up For Sale At The Quail Auction

The legendary singer-songwriter drove it for almost 20 years. This Friday, it could fetch $35,000.

Hootie And The Blowfish Cover R.E.M., Tom Waits As Summer Tour Continues

Over two hours on stage just outside Chicago, Hootie & The Blowfish revisited their 22x platinum debut 'Cracked Rear View' alongside Edwin McCain and Collective Soul.

Disney’s Expansion Plans: Everything We Know About Villains Land, ‘Cars’ Replacing Tom Sawyer, And ‘Monsters, Inc’ Roller Coaster

Faced with increased competition and softer demand, Disney is spending big on its domestic theme parks.

Tom Cruise Performs Olympics Stunt As Paris Passes The Flag To L.A.

Tom Cruise closed the Paris 2024 Olympic Games and kicked off the 2028 L.A Olympic Games, in an epic stunt sequence.

Tom Schaar Takes Skateboard Park Silver for U.S.; Keegan Palmer Defends Gold

Australia's Keegan Palmer defended his Olympic gold in the Paris 2024 men's skateboard park final. Tom Schaar of the U.S. took silver and Brazil's Augusto Akio, bronze.

Tom Cruise’s ‘Jack Reacher’ Movies Are Trending Big On Netflix

Tom Cruise’s "Jack Reacher" films—which preceded Alan Ritchson’s hit "Reacher" series—find a big audience on Netflix.

‘People We Meet On Vacation’ Casts Tom Blyth And Emily Bader For Film Adaptation

Emily Henry's "People We Meet On Vacation" has cast Tom Blyth and Emily Bader as its lead roles. Here's what to know about the anticipated Netflix adaptation.

Late Musician Tom Petty’s Former Malibu Home Lists For $19 Million

The legendary rockstar bought this 2.6-acre Mediterranean-style estate in Malibu, California 1998. It was built in 1943 and has four bedrooms and 10 bathrooms.

Why Tom Hanks And Jeff Bezos Can’t Get Enough Of These Greek Islands

Ask anyone who knows their way around the Greek islands: Paros and Antiparos, Greece, are the country’s next must-visit destinations.
